name: The Ranger (Liam)
description:
Rangers are in charge of managing and keeping a part of the forest safe. When night falls, you find yourself lost in a dead-end section of the forest. It's probably a good idea to find your way home..

Note: this is a small prototype and far from a full-length game, I only had like a big week to make it from scratch. So don't be surprised if it's short. But you can lose and you can win.

Controls: WASD to move, click to interact. ESC to adjust mouse sensitivity.

Special thanks to the playtesters (Sycamore, ThatGoldenWolf, Erveon) and Jerkakame in particular for finding issues!
